website_summaries.verdict: Well-made steel bookends suited for heavy books that work well for most collections, but may be too much for lighter, smaller stacks.
pros: Heavy-duty bookends crafted in steel with a coated finish
Tall, 10-inch design is built to accommodate large, heavy books
cons: A bit top-heavy, and prone to tipping over if books aren't properly aligned
Some owners didn't like the looks of the foam bottoms, but they do resist slipping

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Hitter!
customer_reviews.text: I put these bookends to the test! They are currently holding up 150+ vinyl records. A heavy, quality built item. Highly recommended! (If you find this review useful, PLEASE tap the button below. Thanks!)
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Bookends You Can Trust
customer_reviews.text: These are as strong as everyone says. I put them on a shelf with my cookbooks, and am unafraid. So many other bookends have left my cookbooks sliding like mad every time I took one from the stack; not these...these stay put and make life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought they'd be a lot heavier. But that's not really important because they work exceptionally well. They currently bookend 150+ vinyl records which is no small feat so I'd highly recommend them. Will probably eventually check out the 8 inch version for smaller spaces. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: BeerCanChicken

customer_reviews.title: Holding up piano folios and sheet music.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wall mounted shelf that I'm storing piano folios (books) and other sheet music. These items are usually 10"x12", so kinda taller books, but thin. Regular bookends were too short and height/weight of the books kept bending the bookends. Purchased these and they are sturdy, taller, and wider than standard bookends. My piano books no longer sag, slide, or fall over. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrismis15

customer_reviews.title: Tall and sturdy bookends.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the 10" height, and the heavy duty construction, and they didn't disappoint. These are pretty expensive, but very nice quality. I think almost any bookend would work with hard cover books that tend to stand on their own, but if you've got soft cover catalogs or manuals, or spiral bound books, you need something tall and substantial to keep them from sagging. I didn't like the price, but they are very sturdy bookends! One note, the bases extend about 6", which may affect how you use them in tight quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Satz

customer_reviews.title: Great for records
customer_reviews.text: Using these for my record albums and it works great. I probably could have gotten the 8”, but these are really sturdy and keep my 150 records securely on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: If these were any stronger at holding up books they would probably need a contractor license to install them. We have a tall bookcase and these are holding up oversized architecture books, a lot of them. These work better and look better than the doubled up standard bookends we were using. A great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat Warlord

customer_reviews.title: Holds up vinyl records
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold up vinyl records on a shelf that has no sides. I got a couple orders of these and I space them out every 10 to 15 vinyls. They work fantastic for it
customer_reviews.author: NReese

customer_reviews.title: Life long quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. It's holding our records on our open shelving. Just bought 2 more for the books as well. These are life-long quality products. Very strong and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: High Five

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality, works as expected. I used them to hold my vinyl record albums. does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: BKAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: used for holding vinyls in a stereo cabinet, solid!!!
customer_reviews.text: felt on bottom makes these immobile. Holds my vinyls perfectly on a smooth wooden stereo cabinet. Have never slid, and has the strength and sturdiness to squeeze the vinyls as tightly as one would desire...though I wouldn't recommend squeezing them too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. hooster

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, just like the name says
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold my vinyl record collection in place on a bookshelf and they work great even with 80 records lined up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE STEELMASTER
customer_reviews.text: I like SteelMaster bookends, they never disappoint. They are more expensive, but are absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zuggernaut01

customer_reviews.title: Great for vinyl.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hold up vinyl records on an open-ended shelf and they work great. The base of each is very long, they can support the weight of a good stack of vinyl. I have two sets- each holds around 60 records very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sturdy! I bought the largest size as I have some oversized books. They look professional without being boring. I bought 2 sets to use at work. Rubber pads on the bottom keep them from sliding or scratching anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durable product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Holds all my big 3ring binders in place.
customer_reviews.author: Rsb2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for LPs
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy and secure enough to hold a shelf full of heavy LPs, without wobbling and sliding. They're well made.
customer_reviews.author: John Cochran

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It's strong and holds heavy books in place, which is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Haig1

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied as they are sturdy enough to hold a shelf of heavy scrapbooks when one is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for my vinyl collection
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and simple. I needed something heavy-duty to keep up about 50 records, and these have been working great for over 3 months. Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rotuno-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worked well as shelf dividers.
customer_reviews.text: They were heavy enough to hold up loaded three inch three ring binders. No other bookend could do this.
customer_reviews.author: Informed consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vinyl Records
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these holding up vinyl records on various shelves andthey work great for that purpose!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Prieto

customer_reviews.title: If need sturdy?  This one works
customer_reviews.text: Large and sturdy what needed and these delivered. Others bent but this one came through.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysHaveAnOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for LPs collections
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for LPs collections. Heavy duty, attractive, and wide and tall enough to not give when supporting a long row of records, which inevitably lean. (Certainly more than enough for scholarly hardcovers.)
customer_reviews.author: John Lysaker

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial. Accurately made and well painted. It's heavy and has rubber on the foot. The bookend performs exactly as it's supposed to. I bought a couple to try, and then reordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for heavy product manuals/binders
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy book ends. I use them with my product manuals at work. These manuals are large heavy binders. I pull these books out every day so they get a lot of pressure on them. For the most part, they stay in place. Only occasionally when I put back the binders does one of the book ends slide a little. But they keep the books from shoving my printer off my desk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angles

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these to prop my record collection up. I have almost 180 records between them and they perform admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From an ex-librarian
customer_reviews.text: Not only heavy gauge but with anti-slide pads on the bottom. Like style and finish. I'm using them to organize art books and binders.
customer_reviews.author: E. T. Friel

customer_reviews.title: Will by more as need in the future & have recommended them to other people already
customer_reviews.text: I use these bookends to keep my scrapbooks standing up. They are very heavy as I put double the standard pages in them. Nothing else can hold up these 12"x12" books. I ordered a couple of sets at first to try them and then ordered 6 more sets! Will by more as need in the future & have recommended them to other people already.
customer_reviews.author: gbuss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my old stand by type book ends---now have 4 similar pairs -- all bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth peters

customer_reviews.title: Good for a heavy job
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but high quality. Supporting a bookshelf of large, heavy books. (I have purchased others supposedly heavy duty that do not successfully do this.) Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very large and heavy binders on my desk. These bookends do their job at staying still. I can't recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Aurian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Tall
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely tall and sturdy enough to hold a hefty amount. I have at least 10 books for anatomy and nursing on my shelf that they hold and they haven't budged. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Best strength bookends ever. Could hold up the Leaning Tower!
customer_reviews.text: The quality reflected in the price. I'd have give 7 stars if possible. Used for heavy large photo albums on chrome wire shelves, needed something strong and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Drimmer

customer_reviews.title: These do the job and look good while doing it
customer_reviews.text: Needed bookends to hold up a lot of heavy cookbooks. These do the job and look good while doing it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: randynyc

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy enough for large, heavy books.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these bookends. They really are heavy-duty and sturdy enough to hold many large, heavy art books securely. They don't slide, don't bend. Yes, they are expensive, but, the cheaper bookends just do not work for big books.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee1

customer_reviews.title: Make great dividers...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution to a wide shelf with heavy books or notebooks. I use these as dividers on the shelf versus simply a bookend. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: June J. Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and sturdy holding my thick heavy volumes. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Liss

customer_reviews.title: These are the sturdiest you'll find. They are adequate ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the sturdiest you'll find. They are adequate for a bunch of heavy textbooks but do occasionally still slide from the weight of the books. I believe I ordered the 12 inch.
customer_reviews.author: M Ville

customer_reviews.title: easily holds a dozen or more large
customer_reviews.text: easily holds a dozen or more large, heavy books in place and the bookends are almost invisible next to a book with dark cover. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: skyview

customer_reviews.title: Good for large books, LPs
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these to hold up LP albums. They are perfect for this application. They are strong, well finished and work well.
customer_reviews.author: David F Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Life & Space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for the 10" size was perfect for my big text books and materials. Using these created so much more shelf space.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. I have huge binders that wouldn't stay upright ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I have huge binders that wouldn't stay upright and these were just what I needed to keep them in order. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookends for heavy books and textbooks
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous bookends. Was looking for a set of quite substantial ends to hold heavy text books and these work great.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for supporting LP records on a shelf. Excellent quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T IV

customer_reviews.title: As sturdy as I expected!
customer_reviews.text: They do a great job keeping the books in place. The foam pad on the bottom keeps them in place and protects my table.
customer_reviews.author: Luis M

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Sturdy. Tall. Deep.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our storage shelves. Tall and deep. Strong and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We needed heavy duty bookends to contain vinyl albums. These do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Very big for books, but perfect for my records
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my records and they work like a charm. They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great and solved my desk space problem
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy and well made. They are tall enough to really hold up my notebooks on my desk and they don't tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tough boys do a good job of holding up heavy, tall books.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy bookends!
customer_reviews.text: Industrial strength! Able to hold up my large and heavy cookbook collection that several other bookends couldn't handle!
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Amanda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works perfect handles all my heavy books thanks for a good product
customer_reviews.author: charles carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the bookends. they are so sturdy they hold my books without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: betty dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Great for cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: They really are heavy duty. We have a bunch of very heavy, large cookbooks on the kitchen counter, and these hold them up very well, unlike the other bookends we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sam N. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do! They hold books and binders so well you have no fear anything will fall over or even move. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and very strong
customer_reviews.text: I use these at office to hold files up on shelves. Fits great and very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Hill

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty enough to hold up 4' of 8.5x11" books
customer_reviews.text: I've not had success with many other supposedly Heavy Duty bookends, but these did the trick. So, I'm ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: i needed them for a bookshelf with hefty legal files. They're solid and don't budge; in a word, Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Quintana

customer_reviews.title: It's great. Really sturdy and stable and will hold a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Really sturdy and stable and will hold a large amount of weight. I stack all my big, thick and heavy books. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Was worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These bookends are built with heavy steel and the padding on the bottom is very solid. Nice to find some good quality Made in the USA products. Will order again for my office .
customer_reviews.author: curt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with the width and height to support the thick binders that I need to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a good price. Takes any size book I have thrown at it and holds them as solid as a rock
customer_reviews.author: Martin Cooke

product_meta.title: STEELMASTER Heavy Duty 10-Inch Steel Bookends, 1 Pair, Black (241100004)
product_meta.description: STEELMASTER Heavy Duty Steel Bookends are constructed of strong steel. These 10-Inch Bookends are perfect for housing binders, magazines, and thicker manuals. Coated with a scratch and chip-resistant powder finish, the STEELMASTER Heavy Duty Bookends are made in the USA. Serving the retail, specialty, hospitality, and banking Industries, STEELMASTER products are built to perform and made to last. Each STEELMASTER product is constructed of sturdy, heavy gauge material that is designed to stand up to daily use.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty, durable steel construction coated with a scratch and chip-resistant finish
Features non-slip, non-mar padded base to protect surfaces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
